data.text:
William M. GALLAMORE was born in June 1885 in Daviess Co., Missouri. Parents: Thomas Solomon GALLAMORE and Mary Margaret ADAMS.Zella F. GALLAMORE was born about 1908 in Missouri. Parents: Zephia Sylvester "Zeph" GALLAMORE and Edna D. AYERS.Zephia Sylvester "Zeph" GALLAMORE was born on 10 February 1888 in Daviess Co., Missouri. He died on 22 March 1941 at the age of 53 in Kansas City, Jackson, Missouri. He died in a Kansas City hospital; his last residence was in Winston. He was buried on 24 March 1941 in Winston Cemetery, Daviess, Missouri. Parents: Thomas Solomon GALLAMORE and Mary Margaret ADAMS.

Spouse: Edna D. AYERS. Edna D. AYERS and Zephia Sylvester "Zeph" GALLAMORE were married on 22 December 1907 in Daviess Co., Missouri. Thomas S. Gallamore, father of Zephia, gives consent. Children were: Zella F. GALLAMORE, Elsworth A. GALLAMORE, Bulah B. GALLAMORE, Margaret A. GALLAMORE, T. R. GALLAMORE, Dora Bell GALLAMORE.

GALLAND was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Carol WARNICK. Carol WARNICK and GALLAND were married.

Jacqueline GALLAR was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Tony Lynn WAADEVIG. Jacqueline GALLAR and Tony Lynn WAADEVIG were married on 12 July 1980. Children were: Joshua Lee WAADEVIG, Toni Marie WAADEVIG.

GALLATIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Regina RAULIE. Regina RAULIE and GALLATIN were married.

GALLATIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Louise BUSH. Louise BUSH and GALLATIN were married.

Albert GALLATIN was born in 1821. He died on 15 May 1845 at the age of 24. He was buried in Sharon, Noble, Ohio. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Jerusha BOYCE.Albert K. GALLATIN was born on 21 April 1854 in Missouri. He died on 10 July 1923 at the age of 69. He was buried in May Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.Arthela Martha GALLATIN was born on 25 February 1904 in Chula, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 28 August 1906 at the age of 2 in Chula, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried in May Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: William Oliver GALLATIN and Mary Eliza "Mamie" FLAHERTY.Audrey GALLATIN was born on 2 August 1910 in Wheeling, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 13 June 1969 at the age of 58 in Linn Co., Missouri. She was buried on 15 June 1969 in Marceline, Linn, Missouri. Parents: Judge John Milton GALLATIN and Maude Elizabeth SPARLING.

Spouse: Carl F. LOHMAR. Audrey GALLATIN and Carl F. LOHMAR were married.

Bertha E. GALLATIN was born about 1905 in Missouri. Parents: James H. GALLATIN and Elizabeth G. WILLARD.Charles Everett GALLATIN was born on 4 December 1893 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 8 January 1964 at the age of 70 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 11 January 1964 in Resthaven Memorial Gardens, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Elvia May ANDERSON. Elvia May ANDERSON and Charles Everett GALLATIN were married on 22 March 1913 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. J. C. Gallatin, father of Charles, gives consent. Children were: James Leo GALLATIN, Vernon Arthur GALLATIN.

Claude R. GALLATIN was born on 20 March 1890 in Chillicothe Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 14 April 1979 at the age of 89. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Elvia May ANDERSON. Elvia May ANDERSON and Claude R. GALLATIN were married on 5 June 1967 in Jackson Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Jackson Co., Missouri.

Cora Belle GALLATIN was born on 12 April 1870 in Liberty Twp., Grundy, Missouri. The 1870 Federal census says birth was in February 1870. She died on 21 January 1953 at the age of 82 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 23 January 1953 in Anderson Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Wiley Clark ANDERSON. Cora Belle GALLATIN and Wiley Clark ANDERSON were married on 5 March 1891 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Livingston Co. Children were: Elva B. ANDERSON, Elmer L. ANDERSON, Dewey Elmer ANDERSON, Everett Wiley ANDERSON, Grace Agnes ANDERSON.

Delocky GALLATIN was born on 16 January 1855 in Missouri. She died on 20 January 1881 at the age of 26. She was buried in Mercer Co., Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.

Spouse: William Henry BARNES. Delocky GALLATIN and William Henry BARNES were married.

Edwin J. GALLATIN was born on 20 May 1883 in Mercer Co., Missouri. He died on 16 February 1976 at the age of 92 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 17 February 1976 in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Ora Mae RAULIE. Ora Mae RAULIE and Edwin J. GALLATIN were married on 31 October 1905 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Children were: Regina Ruth GALLATIN, Rex Edwin GALLATIN.

Elmer E. GALLATIN was born about 1901 in Missouri. Parents: James H. GALLATIN and Elizabeth G. WILLARD.Flora May GALLATIN was born on 1 June 1872 in Mercer Co., Missouri. She died on 4 March 1956 at the age of 83 in Trenton Twp., Grundy, Missouri. She was buried in Anderson-Smith Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: J. S. THOMPSON. Flora May GALLATIN and J. S. THOMPSON were married on 14 September 1893 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe Twp.

Francinia GALLATIN was born on 12 January 1825. She died on 3 June 1896 at the age of 71 in Noble Co., Ohio. She was buried in Sharon, Noble, Ohio. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Jerusha BOYCE.Francis B. GALLATIN was born in 1819. He died in 1845 at the age of 26 in Ohio. He was buried in Sharon, Noble, Ohio. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Jerusha BOYCE.Gaile GALLATIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Norman Romaine GALLATIN and Mildred "Mimi" SHORT.George GALLATIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Edna Marie BEALL. Edna Marie BEALL and George GALLATIN were married.

Gladys R. GALLATIN was born in July 1888 in Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Clarence Henry PRAGER. Gladys R. GALLATIN and Clarence Henry PRAGER were married on 14 October 1910 in Olive Branch, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe.

Grace Luella GALLATIN was born on 7 September 1886 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 2 July 1971 at the age of 84 in Dallas, Dallas, Texas. She was buried in Dallas, Dallas, Texas. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Isom Walter COX. Grace Luella GALLATIN and Isom Walter COX were married on 24 March 1906 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. Children were: Max Abel COX.

Grace M. GALLATIN was born on 17 February 1908 in Chula, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 23 April 1973 at the age of 65 in Concord, Contra Costa, California. She was buried on 28 April 1973 in May Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. She never married. Parents: William Oliver GALLATIN and Mary Eliza "Mamie" FLAHERTY.Herbert G. GALLATIN was born about 1905 in Missouri. Parents: James H. GALLATIN and Elizabeth G. WILLARD.Howard N. GALLATIN was born in 1908 in Missouri. He died in 1984 at the age of 76. He was buried in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Judge John Milton GALLATIN and Maude Elizabeth SPARLING.James H. GALLATIN was born about 1878 in Mercer Co., Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Elizabeth G. WILLARD. Elizabeth G. WILLARD and James H. GALLATIN were married on 7 February 1900 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Elmer E. GALLATIN, Zelma GALLATIN, Bertha E. GALLATIN, Herbert G. GALLATIN, Virgil F. GALLATIN.

James L. GALLATIN was born in October 1860 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He died on 1 May 1930 at the age of 69 in Jackson, Jackson, Michigan. He was buried in Jackson, Jackson, Michigan. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.

Spouse: Parmelia Ellen BRITTAIN. Parmelia Ellen BRITTAIN and James L. GALLATIN were married.

Spouse: Emma MCALLISTER. Emma MCALLISTER and James L. GALLATIN were married.

James Leo GALLATIN was born about 1915 in Missouri. Parents: Charles Everett GALLATIN and Elvia May ANDERSON.Jeremiah GALLATIN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Susannah "Anna" HARRISON.

Jeremiah GALLATIN was born in 1827. He died in 1849 at the age of 22 in Ohio. He was buried in Sharon, Noble, Ohio. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Jerusha BOYCE.Jeremiah C. GALLATIN was born on 14 July 1797 in Pennsylvania. He died in 1866 at the age of 69 in Livingston Co., Missouri.

Spouse: Jerusha BOYCE. Jerusha BOYCE and Jeremiah C. GALLATIN were married. Children were: Francis B. GALLATIN, Albert GALLATIN, Francinia GALLATIN, Jeremiah GALLATIN.

Spouse: Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY. Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY and Jeremiah C. GALLATIN were married. Children were: Louisa GALLATIN, Tabitha A. GALLATIN, Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN, Albert K. GALLATIN, Delocky GALLATIN, John Quincy GALLATIN, James L. GALLATIN, Oliver Asbury GALLATIN.

Spouse: Susannah N. "Susan" HARRISON. Susannah N. "Susan" HARRISON and Jeremiah C. GALLATIN were married on 22 March 1864. The gravestone reportedly shows death on 12 apr 1859 in Ohio.

Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN was born on 25 November 1850 in Springhill, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 25 February 1934 at the age of 83 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 27 February 1934 in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.

Spouse: Martha Jane BRITTAIN. Martha Jane BRITTAIN and Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN were married on 2 May 1869 in Mercer Co., Missouri. Children were: Cora Belle GALLATIN, Flora May GALLATIN, William Oliver GALLATIN, James H. GALLATIN, Judge John Milton GALLATIN, Edwin J. GALLATIN, Grace Luella GALLATIN, Gladys R. GALLATIN, Claude R. GALLATIN, Charles Everett GALLATIN.

Judge John Milton GALLATIN was born on 28 July 1880 in Halfrock, Mercer, Missouri. He died on 3 February 1969 at the age of 88 in Chillicothe Hospital, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 5 February 1969 in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He was a public school teacher in Utica in 1910. John was Postmaster of Chillicothe in 1930. He served as Livingston County probate judge for 28 years. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Maude Elizabeth SPARLING. Maude Elizabeth SPARLING and Judge John Milton GALLATIN were married on 27 November 1907 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Howard N. GALLATIN, Audrey GALLATIN, Martha Jean GALLATIN.

John Quincy GALLATIN was born on 9 May 1858 in Missouri. He died on 4 December 1882 at the age of 24. He was buried in Maple Grove Cemetery, Grundy, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.Louisa GALLATIN was born about 1847 in Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.Lydia May GALLATIN was born on 21 August 1901 in Chula, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 21 July 1995 at the age of 93 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 24 July 1995 in Resthaven Memorial Gardens, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: William Oliver GALLATIN and Mary Eliza "Mamie" FLAHERTY.

Spouse: Morgan Ivor EVANS. Lydia May GALLATIN and Morgan Ivor EVANS were married on 29 November 1923 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. The bride was of Chula, the groom of Dawn. Children were: Helen E. EVANS, Thomas William EVANS, Margaret Yvonne EVANS, James Craig "Jim" EVANS, Lydia Ann EVANS, William EVANS.

Martha Jean GALLATIN was born about 1925 in Missouri. Parents: Judge John Milton GALLATIN and Maude Elizabeth SPARLING.

Spouse: Robert C. MCFEETERS. Martha Jean GALLATIN and Robert C. MCFEETERS were married on 29 November 1946 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. The bride was of Chillicothe, the groom of Higginsville.

Norman Romaine GALLATIN was born on 6 August 1912 in Chula, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 26 September 1989 at the age of 77 in Springfield, Greene, Missouri. Social Security records report a death date of 24 Sep 1989. He was buried on 28 September 1989 in Pierce City, Lawrence, Missouri. He lived in Des Moines, Iowa in 1950. Parents: William Oliver GALLATIN and Mary Eliza "Mamie" FLAHERTY.

Spouse: Mildred "Mimi" SHORT. Mildred "Mimi" SHORT and Norman Romaine GALLATIN were married on 29 July 1934 in Marceline, Linn, Missouri. The bride was of Pierce City, Lawrence Co., Missouri, the groom of Chula. Children were: Gaile GALLATIN, Norman William GALLATIN.

Norman William GALLATIN was born (date unknown). Parents: Norman Romaine GALLATIN and Mildred "Mimi" SHORT.Oliver Asbury GALLATIN was born on 14 February 1863 in Springdale, Marion, Missouri. He died on 6 May 1953 at the age of 90 in Broken Arrow, Tulsa, Oklahoma. He was buried in Westville, Adair, Oklahoma. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.Regina Ruth GALLATIN was born on 29 July 1906 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 24 June 1983 at the age of 76 in Kings Park, Suffolk, New York. She was buried on 30 June 1983 in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Edwin J. GALLATIN and Ora Mae RAULIE.

Spouse: MARTIN. Regina Ruth GALLATIN and MARTIN were married.

Rex Edwin GALLATIN was born on 19 February 1908 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 4 October 1970 at the age of 62 in Wadsworth, Leavenworth, Kansas. His home was in Chillicothe. He was buried in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He served in World War II. Parents: Edwin J. GALLATIN and Ora Mae RAULIE.

Spouse: Ketura "Kitty" ANDERSON. Ketura "Kitty" ANDERSON and Rex Edwin GALLATIN were married on 5 October 1946.

Tabitha A. GALLATIN was born about 1848 in Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah C. GALLATIN and Tabitha "Lockey" WINFREY.Vernon Arthur GALLATIN was born about 1918 in Missouri. Parents: Charles Everett GALLATIN and Elvia May ANDERSON.Virgil F. GALLATIN was born about 1909 in Rich Hill Twp., Livingston, Missouri. Parents: James H. GALLATIN and Elizabeth G. WILLARD.William Oliver GALLATIN was born on 6 May 1874 in Grundy Co., Missouri. He died on 27 June 1950 at the age of 76 in Chillicothe Hospital, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 30 June 1950 in May Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jeremiah Craig "Jerry" GALLATIN and Martha Jane BRITTAIN.

Spouse: Mary Eliza "Mamie" FLAHERTY. Mary Eliza "Mamie" FLAHERTY and William Oliver GALLATIN were married on 9 August 1900 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Lydia May GALLATIN, Arthela Martha GALLATIN, Grace M. GALLATIN, Norman Romaine GALLATIN.

Zelma GALLATIN was born about 1903 in Missouri. Parents: James H. GALLATIN and Elizabeth G. WILLARD.
